name: ai_resistant_assignment_generator
description: A tool to generate AI-resistant assignments based on grade level, topic, and uploaded files.

inputs.name: grade_level
inputs.description: The grade level for which the AI-resistant assignment will be generated.

inputs.name: topic
inputs.description: The topic for the AI-resistant assignment.

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: The uploaded assignment file (PDF, DOCX, PPT, Plain Text).

outputs.name: modification_explanations
outputs.description: Explanations detailing how the assignments were modified to resist AI-generated solutions.
